topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400e66963687220a4570000#post_5400e66963687220a4570000

"Mhm.":http://www.wired.com/2014/08/nintendo-new-3ds/

Which would be fine, except they're making exclusive games for it when most people have had their 3ds for less then a year or two.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400e6a46368721be0a70000#post_5400e6a46368721be0a70000

If you have the original 3ds, that's one thing. At least that's been around for a while. But I can't use the 3ds; I need a 3DS XL because I'm subject to eyestrain which leads to terrible headaches. And now I'm learning that the system I've had for a few months won't be able to play the new games.

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400e67b636872415c110000#post_5400e67b636872415c110000
My mom got me mine last year by complete surprise.

Now I have to explain to her that I need to get _a new one_.

Unbelievable. I don't even have a Wii U yet now I have to get _this_ too!


"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400e6a46368721be0a70000#post_5400e6a46368721be0a70000
I hope so, I want me Nerdlyness to be free!

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400e6a46368721be0a70000#post_5400e6a46368721be0a70000
It's ok to upgrade, but to be _forced_ to upgrade is complete crap.

now let me state the new 3DS looks nice and all but come on, the old ones aren't even that old!
